title: Wednesday Post Show (12-15-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (12-15-21)
description:
Bobby plays a voicemail he got from Listener Sarah who needs advice on getting engaged. We get an update from Raymundo on selling Bobby’s Beanie Babies for a commission. He also gives us a rundown of all of his business ventures he has going on right now. Morgan says she had a “Karen” tell on her at the mall in Zara. Amy also tells us how his car smelled like marijuana after valeting it at a comedy show. She also gives an update on getting a parrot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby plays a voicemail he got from Listener Sarah who needs advice on getting engaged. We get an update from Raymundo on selling Bobby’s Beanie Babies for a commission. He also gives us a rundown of all of his business ventures he has going on right now. Morgan says she had a “Karen” tell on her at the mall in Zara. Amy also tells us how his car smelled like marijuana after valeting it at a comedy show. She also gives an update on getting a parrot.
